title: Interactive Exercise: Build a Safe Number Converter
description:
Create a program that asks the user for a number and converts it safely. If they enter invalid input, give them a friendly message and use a default value of 0.

**Your task:**
1. Create a try/except block
2. Try to convert user input to an integer
3. If it fails (ValueError), print a helpful message
4. Use a default value of 0 if conversion fails
5. Print the final number
